name: Long Spear
description:
A submission to "Tu juego a juicio Jam 2021"

This is a game on which you have a variant-sized spear that can become TOO LONG(Jam theme here) and this determines how you move through the levels

Enjoy 13 levels with puzzles, explosions and some enemies to kick 

***Instructions***

Use WASD and arrow keys to move around

Use R to restart the current level

Use F to skip the current level
